name: A. The Very Beautiful Blanket
editorial:
The maximum number of different

for any and .Note that if we were able to construct a correct matrix,

Therefore, letâs build a correct matrix for some and , and as an answer
we will output the upper left corner of this matrix of the desired

break it into blocks of size . Letâs number the blocks from left to
right and from top to bottom in order, starting from zero. The ith block
will have the form With this construction, the bitwise exclusive OR any

There are 4 cases: both coordinates are even; is even, is odd; odd,
even; both coordinates are odd. Immediately note that Consider the most
unpleasant case the last one. The remaining cases are treated in a
similar way. In this case, the submatrix will have the form: Note that
the second part of each term is less than 4, and the first part of each
term is greater than or equal to 4. Therefore, they can be considered
independently. .If , then , .If , then (for , you can check with your
hands, for will be reduced and will remain from the second term). .
Thus, in the selected submatrix, the bitwise exclusive OR is zero.
